page.title: 19Parbold-Hilldale Chapel
page.content: Attendances of the various Sunday Services are as follows:40,inc.children at the 11a.m.Family Gospel Service, 20 at the 2.30pm Sunday School,20 at the 6.30pm Evening Worship,15 at the 7.30pm Lord's Supper.On Wednesday 10 attend the 2.30pm Ladies Fellowship and 8 the 7.45pm Bible Study.From Aug.4th the time of the Gospel Service will be changed to 10.30am and the Sunday Schl. to 11.50am.Its purpose is to keep the present children,give them a free after noon and to attract new children.The hymn books used are Â£Christian Hymns' and Â£Golden Bells'.In the summer holidays 1984 the Church ran a Holiday Club/Mission for children of 9-13years. This will be held again in 1985 and continue each year.
